mapper.select: SELECT c.board_idx, c.comm_title, c.contents, u.nickname AS create_user, c.createAt, c.hit_cnt, t.title AS theme_title, ca.name AS cafe_name FROM communication c LEFT JOIN theme t ON c.comm_theme_idx = t.theme_idx LEFT JOIN cafe ca ON c.cafe_id = ca.cafe_id LEFT JOIN user u ON c.create_user = u.user_id WHERE c.deleted_yn = 'N' ORDER BY c.board_idx DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE communication SET hit_cnt = hit_cnt + 1 WHERE board_idx = #{boardIdx}
mapper.select: SELECT c.board_idx, c.comm_title, c.contents, c.createAt, u.nickname AS create_user, c.hit_cnt, t.title AS theme_title, ca.name AS cafe_name, c.comm_image, c.comm_theme_idx FROM communication c LEFT JOIN theme t ON c.comm_theme_idx = t.theme_idx LEFT JOIN cafe ca ON c.cafe_id = ca.cafe_id LEFT JOIN user u ON c.create_user = u.user_id WHERE c.deleted_yn = 'N' AND c.board_idx = #{boardIdx} ORDER BY c.board_idx DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO communication (comm_title, contents, create_user, createAt, cafe_id, comm_image, comm_theme_idx) VALUES (#{commTitle}, #{contents}, #{createUser}, now(), #{cafeId}, #{commImage}, #{commThemeIdx})
mapper.delete: UPDATE communication SET deleted_yn = 'Y', updateAt = now() WHERE board_idx = ${boardIdx}
mapper.update: UPDATE communication SET comm_title = #{commTitle}, cafe_id = #{cafeId}, contents = #{contents}, updateAt = now(), comm_image = #{commImage}, comm_theme_idx = #{commThemeIdx} WHERE board_idx = #{boardIdx}
